text: Ojo in durūƣʙarovardagon dar zamin sajr nakardaand, to ʙingarand, ki oqiʙati kasone, ki pajomʙaronaşonro durūƣ ʙarovardand, peş az onho mezistaand, cī guna ʙudaast? Onho mardume, ʙudand, ki nerūjaşon ʙeştar va osoraşon dar rūi zamin farovontar ʙud. Pas, on cizho, az ʙinoho, ʙoƣho va kiştzorho, ki ʙa dast meovardand, hangomi faro rasidani azoʙ ʙa onho foidae naʙaxşid
